TopicTitle: The Altair Project (Manned mission to Duna Machinima)

Articles.Content:
It's been quite some time since I posted anything on these forums. This is a short movie I've been working on for the last week or so. Enjoy.

Part four coming soon.

The rest of my work can be found here: http://www.youtube.com/user/StreetlampPro

Edited October 17, 2012 by Streetlamp
Hmm I think I just found my Duna Mission plan and Excellent Video, Hope to see many more.

Nicely done. The music is intense and edgy, so the first part could have used a quiet moment while viewing the Mun. Otherwise, I enjoyed every moment of all three parts. Excellent use of the fixed camera and parts mods, music sequencing, and special effects. Also, I loved that quote about the dinosaurs.

Where did you get the radio voices? That was good stuff too!
This is really excellent stuff. Great work! You've quite an eye for composition and editing, and the music's perfect.

Wow, I can't believe that I didn't subscribe to you earlier! This is a brilliant series of videos, can't wait for part 4!

Jiggyb2

Epic series, great cinematography, and I think you've even got more or less the same mission plan to Duna as me. (Crew transfer vehicle and lander in two separate launches.)

I'm also impressed that you seem to be conducting this like, well, a real space program, probe series and all.

Definitely going to be following you from now on.

EDIT: What's the escape tower mod you're using there, with the smaller parachute that goes under it?

Edited October 19, 2012 by Commander Zoom
